bham.leakiest.infotheory

Class KernelFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • bham.leakiest.infotheory.KernelFunction

  • public class KernelFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    This file contains the method for estimating a continuous probability distribution from sampled data using a kernel function.
    Version:
    1.4.6
    Author:
    Tom Chothia, Yusuke Kawamoto

    • Field Summary

      static int resolutionForMI
      Parameter to approximate the mutual information for the continuous data

    • Method Detail

      • calcContinuousApproxMI

        public double calcContinuousApproxMI(double[] distInput,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<double[]> Datalist)
        Calculates the estimated mutual information. This method returns:
        I(Q,W) = I (X;Y) = Σ_x ∫_y Q(x).W(y|x)log(W(y|x)/Y(y)) dy = Q(input_0) ∫_y W(y|input_0)log(W(y|input_0)/Y(y)) dy + ... + Q(input_k) ∫_y W(y|input_k)log(W(y|input_k)/Y(y)) dy
        Y(y) = Q(input_0) W(y|input_0) + ... + Q(input_k) W(y|input_k)
        ∫_y W(y|input_x)log(W(y|input_x)/Y(y)) dy = ∫_n^{n_1} W(y|input_x)log(W(y|input_x)/Y(y)) dy + ∫_{n_1}^{n_2} W(y|input_x)log(W(y|input_x)/Y(y)) dy + ...
        where ∫_{n_1}^{n_2} W(y|input_x)log(W(y|input_x)/Y(y)) dy ~ W(n_1|input_x)log(W(n_1|input_x)/Y(n_1))*(n_2-n_1)
        Parameters:
        distInput - input probability distribution
        Datalist - list of observed data
        Returns:
        estimated mutual information

      • probInputDist

        public double[] probInputDist(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> DataList)
        Calculates estimated input distribution.
        Parameters:
        DataList - list of observation data
        Returns:
        estimated input distribution
